articles.author: Tim Schmitt, Austin American-Statesman
articles.title: PGA golfer Patrick Reed files lawsuit against Brandel Chamblee - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Lawsuit seeks $750 million in damages for defamation.
articles.content:
Is sports commentary often bombastic and entertaining to be held to a similar standard to analysis reserved for politics and hard news?
It appears we might find out, right here in Texas.
It might s… [+7477 chars]
